original_title: Pour ne pas finir dans un bocal
overview: Friday, January 13, 2023. A mysterious book appears in the living room with the explicit instruction not to read chapter 13. But hey - what could happen? It's just a book after all.
tagline: A mysterious book appears out of nowhere... Explicit instruction not to read chapter 13... What could happen? It's just a book, right?
title: So that one does not end up in a jar
